info.name: Steemit Night Mode
info.description: A dark style for Steemit.com, inspired by night mode on Poloniex.com. If this style becomes popular, I will create a corresponding GitHub repository or Gist to manage open source contributions. Please upvote my original post on Steemit if you find this useful!
info.additionalInfo:
[1.0.0] 2017-06-17
- Initial release

[1.0.1] 2017-06-21
Many thanks to @cryptophynk for the improvements!
https://steemit.com/@cryptophunk
- Improved blockquotes
- Themed account menu
- Themed trending tags page
